name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open BPL Catalog in New Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add 'Open in New Tab' buttons to Berkeley Public Library (Berkeley, CA, USA) Catalog search results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The BPL Catalog (https://catalog.berkeleypubliclibrary.org) does not allow you to open search results in new tabs (or windows) by right-clicking and selecting "Open link in new tab." Using this button allows you to work around this limitation.
